title: Airdrop 2: Recipients and Distribution
body:
As per the ratified token distribution schedule, this simple proposal contemplates airdropping the below 8 individuals 37,500 $VROOM tokens each (300,000 tokens; or, 3% of total supply) on Monday September 27, 2021:

1. Jeff Carvalho - Co-founder, Highsnobiety, Burrata Corp. and Culture Club (Brian Trunzo) 
2. Roman Feldman - Portfolio Manager, Point72 Asset Management (Matt Breen) 
3. Rajuju Brown - Music Producer and Studio Engineer, Self (Atif Ahmad) 
4. Anoop Kansupada - Marketing Director, Serotonin (Aditya Naik) 
5. Mike Letizia - Sales Director, G4S Security (Pete Bronzino) 
6. Quentin Humphrey - Music Producer, Full Picture and and Trend Strategist, WGSN (delegated to Brian Trunzo) 
7. Yoram Heller - Co-Owner, Intercare Therapy and Angel Investor / Adviser (delegated to Brian Trunzo)  
8. Vin Bartolillo - Hair Stylist, Mildred (delegated to Brian Trunzo) 

Along with the airdrop, vroomDAO will formally invite each token holder to participate in the group's gated Discord server.

This proposal also clarifies a typo made in Proposal No. 1 titled "Token Distribution Schedule: Ratification": the total airdrop distribution should be 17%, not 20%, of total token supply (a typo -- held over from a past draft). That change is noted here and incorporated to that proposal retroactively.
author: 0x7b78F347cc40F15344EDE278EcEC4E39E1F15485
